subject: Boxing
Poverty
lead_paragraph: Instead of defending his title against Floyd Mayweather Jr., Manny Pacquiao faces Joshua Clottey, who survived poverty and career turmoil to emerge from an unlikely boxing hotbed.
snippet: Instead of defending his title against Floyd Mayweather Jr., Manny Pacquiao faces Joshua Clottey, who survived poverty and career turmoil to emerge from an unlikely boxing hotbed.
